title: Jaap Steenbergen Stipendium
issuer: Dutch Hematology Organization (Nederlandse Vereniging voor Hematologie)
description: Best PhD thesis in the field of hematology published in 2023 in the Netherlands

title: Computational Biology Training in Hematology (CBTH)
description: CBTH provides early-career researchers aiming to specialize in computational and quantitative biology aspects of hematology with a unique, year-long training and mentoring experience by top-tier faculty. The program is fully funded by EHA and offered to a select list of applicants.

title: ASH Abstract Achievement Award
description: 2024 ASH Abstract Achievement Award for the abstract titled 'Transcriptional Profiling Directs the Classification of Mixed Phenotype Acute Leukemias into AML, B-ALL or T-ALL'
